Layout.metadataTitle: Locker.ai | deliver, store, retrieve lost items securely
Layout.metadataDescription: Locker.ai is a service that uses a unique AI-driven authentication mechanism to safely report and retrieve lost items.

SignInDialog.title: You need to sign in
SignInDialog.prompt: Locker.ai is a service that uses a unique AI-driven authentication mechanism to safely report and retrieve lost items. Sign in to the Locker.ai to manage lost items.

RelateResultDialog.title: Linking fingerprint successful!
RelateResultDialog.description:
Now your fingerprint is linked to your account.
Please scan your fingerprint again to unlock the door.

Footer.description: AI-driven lost and found management service.

ReportLostItemSection.title: Report
ReportLostItemSection.description: Take photos of the lost item and report to it.

ReportLostItemForm.dropzoneText: Drag and drop or select images of the lost item.

ReportedDialog.title: Lost item was reported!
ReportedDialog.description:
Thank you for your good deed.
Please go to locker and store the lost item in the drawer provided.

SearchLostItemSection.title: Search
SearchLostItemSection.description: Enter the description of the lost item and the date and time of loss.

SearchLostItemChat.noSimilarItemFound: No similar lost item were found in the database.
SearchLostItemChat.cannotSendWhileResponding: You can not send message while the chatbot is responding.
SearchLostItemChat.inputPlaceholderReady: Describe your lost item or situation...

ToolInvocation.gettingDateTime: Getting the current date and time...
ToolInvocation.searchingLostItem: Searching for the lost item "{description}" lost around {date}...
ToolInvocation.noSimilarItemFoundDetailed: No items similar to "{description}" lost around {date} were found. {message}
ToolInvocation.possiblyYours: There is an item that is possibly yours, similar to "{description}" lost around {date}.
ToolInvocation.mostSimilarItem: The most similar item to "{description}" lost around {date}

ResultDialog.title: You are authorized as owner!
ResultDialog.description:
You are now authorized as the owner of this lost item.
Please go to the nearest locker and retrieve the lost item.

PinnedTaskSection.deliveringInstruction: You are in the process of delivering a lost item. Please go to the nearest locker and put in the lost item.
PinnedTaskSection.retrievingInstruction: You are in the process of retrieving a lost item. Please go to the nearest locker and take out the lost item.
